```{r,echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(readr)

```


## Data Preparation

### Load Data
```{r}
steamdata<-read_csv("steamGameData.csv")
summary(steamdata)
```

### Data Preprocessing
```{r}
#rename id column(it was missing one, and received default name)
colnames(steamdata)[which(colnames(steamdata) == "X1")] <- "id"
steamdata = subset(steamdata, select = -c(link, store_genres, store_asset_mod_time))

head(steamdata)%>%kable()

getengine = function(enginetext){
  ifelse(grepl("Engine.",enginetext,fixed=TRUE), strsplit(strsplit(enginetext, split = ";")[[1]][1], split = "Engine.")[[1]][2] , "NA")
    
}
steamdata$detected_technologies = lapply(steamdata$detected_technologies,FUN = getengine)

```
